class MoveSequence {

    static void generateSequences(int u, int l, char[] current, int index, List<char[]> list) {

        if (u ==0 && l ==0) {

            list.add(current.clone());

            return;

        }

        if (u >0) {

            current[index] = 'U';

            generateSequences(u-1, l, current, index+1, list);

        }

        if (l>0) {

            current[index] = 'L';

            generateSequences(u, l-1, current, index+1, list);

        }

    }

}

import java.util.Scanner;

import java.util.ArrayList;

public class check{

    public static void main(String[] args){

        Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);

        int t=sc.nextInt();

        while(t-->0){

            int n=sc.nextInt();

            int m=sc.nextInt();

            String[] arr=new String[n];

            ArrayList<int[]> robotPositions = new ArrayList<>();

            for(int i=0; i <n; i++){

                arr[i] = sc.next();

                for(int j=0; j < m; j++){

                    if (arr[i].charAt(j) == 'R') {

                        robotPositions.add(new int[]{i,j});

                    }

                }

            }

            boolean flag = false;

            // first check if any robot is already at (0,0)

            for (int[] pos : robotPositions) {

                if (pos[0]==0 && pos[1]==0) {

                    flag = true;

                    break;

                }

            }

            if (!flag) {

                // check each robot

                for (int[] robot : robotPositions) {

                    int r = robot[0], c = robot[1];

                    int x = r, y = c;

                    if (x ==0 && y ==0) continue;

                    int s = x + y;

                    // generate all masks

                    for (int mask=0; mask < (1<<s); mask++) {

                        int countU =0;

                        for (int i=0; i<s; i++) {

                            if ((mask & (1<<i)) !=0) countU++;

                        }

                        if (countU !=x) continue;

                        // create sequence.

                        char[] seq = new char[s];

                        for (int i=0; i<s; i++) {

                            if ((mask & (1<<i)) !=0) seq[i] = 'U';

                            else seq[i] = 'L';

                        }

                        // simulate the sequence.

                        // copy the robots' positions.

                        ArrayList<int[]> currentRobots = new ArrayList<>();

                        for (int[] pos : robotPositions) {

                            currentRobots.add(new int[]{pos[0], pos[1]});

                        }

                        boolean valid = true;

                        for (char move : seq) {

                            // check all can move.

                            for (int[] pos : currentRobots) {

                                if (move == 'U' && pos[0] ==0) {

                                    valid = false;

                                    break;

                                } else if (move == 'L' && pos[1] ==0) {

                                    valid = false;

                                    break;

                                }

                            }

                            if (!valid) break;

                            // move all robots.

                            for (int i=0; i<currentRobots.size(); i++) {

                                int[] pos = currentRobots.get(i);

                                if (move == 'U') {

                                    pos[0]--;

                                } else {

                                    pos[1]--;

                                }

                            }

                        }

                        if (valid) {

                            // check if any robot is at (0,0)

                            for (int[] pos : currentRobots) {

                                if (pos[0]==0 && pos[1]==0) {

                                    flag = true;

                                    break;

                                }

                            }

                        }

                        if (flag) break;

                    }

                    if (flag) break;

                }

            }

            if (flag) {

                System.out.println("YES");

            } else {

                System.out.println("NO");

            }

        }

        sc.close();

    }

}
